old:
エレメントアーチャ―の魔矢は、攻撃だけで
なく自身や味方の回復・支援も行えます

＜基本操作／支援＞
<PADM>　【<KC WEAPON_MAIN>】助真の構え（支援矢構え）<KEYM>　【<KC HOLD_BOW>】+【<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>前後】構え変更（初期設定の場合）</KEYM>
<PADM>　【<KC WEAPON_MAIN>】＋【右スティック】
　　　　　　助真の魔眼（複数味方ロックオン）<KEYM>　【<KC HOLD_BOW>】助真の構え（支援矢構え）
　【<KC HOLD_BOW>】＋【<ICON MOUSE>移動】助真の魔眼（複数味方ロックオン）</KEYM>
　　構えながら【<KC SHOOT>】助真の矢
　【<KC CHANGE_ARROW>】癒しの装（自分を回復）
new:
The magic arrows of the Element Archer not only allow for attacks, but also enable healing and support for oneself and allies.

<Basic Controls/Support>
<PADM> Press [<KC WEAPON_MAIN>] for True Support Stance.
<KEYM>Hold [<KC HOLD_BOW>] + scroll wheel forward/backward [<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>] to switch to a different stance (if using default settings).
<PADM>Hold [<KC WEAPON_MAIN>] + move right stick for Magick Eye: True Aid, which can lock onto multiple allies.
<KEYM><KC HOLD_BOW> for Magick Eye: True Aid (Support Arrow Stance)</KEYM>
While in stance, press [<KC SHOOT>] to shoot True Aid Arrows.
Press [<KC CHANGE_ARROW>] for Healing Shroud and self-recovery.
